title: Ep. 487 - Democrat Governors Don't Want To Give Up Their Lockdown Powers
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, some states are coming out of lockdowns while others are extending them for no medically justifiable reason. What’s one thing the extension states have in common? They’re run by Democrats. What does that tell us? Also, Five Headlines, including NASA’s plan to intentionally create a meteor shower and CNN bringing Greta Thunberg onto their “expert” coronavirus panel. And in our Daily Cancellation, I will finally be cancelling the hero worship of nurses.

If you like The Matt Walsh Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: WALSH and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/Walsh
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
